file_content.text: Punctual, gentlemen. Glad you could make it all this way. No trouble acquiring my little request, I take?
Hmph. It's here. You got our money?
Of course, friend, but I'd be remiss if I didn't ask to see the goods first.
Satisfied?
I think you need to tell me more about this plan.
This requires explanation.
We're getting to that part just as soon as we're finished here.
That's a fine piece of hardware.
Impressive.
It should do.
What do we possibly need a missile for?
You can't be serious.
Just the important part, really.
You got our money?
About that... I was really thinking we should renegotiate the price, you know, seeing as I don't need the whole missile.
I thought you might feel that way.
Launch sequence initiated. Target acquired. Total atomic dispersal in T-minus one minute!
You--you son of a--make it stop!
Nah.
Are you insane?
Gault!
Not while I'm negotiating.
Hope you're a good runner.
I wouldn't stick around.
Jumping might be faster.
I could have just killed them.
Seems unnecessary.
Lacks panache.
T-minus fifty-five seconds. Warhead primed: suffering index set to maximum!
You're gonna pay for this!
Suckers.
Abort sequence: aborted. No stopping me now!
Ugh, what'd she do to this thing!
C'mon, c'mon! It's not responding!
Are there any circuits you could cut?
Try the wiring.
Oh sure, dozens--got any ideas which ones?
I think the pirates had the right idea!
Forget it, run!
If this thing really goes off here, it won't help.
If I die because you wanted to stiff your dealer, there won't be a Corellian hell far enough to hide you from me.
You son of a...!
Less threatening, more helping!
Tampering detected, emergency detonation in five seconds. Nice try, jerks!
Grr. I can't tell if she did a terrible job rewiring this or too good of one.
Three...! Ooo, so close! Two...! I can't wait! One...!
Kaboom!
Haha! Ha! Ah, haha, you should have seen the--oh!
Vette?
I didn't... but I thought you were....
You're alive!
Ahem, maybe not the best place for a tearful reunion.
Uh, fancy seeing you here...!
Oh, good, you know each other. Saves me the trouble.
Haha! Ah, haha! Ha... oh, that was great!
Ha. Ha.
C'mon, that was pretty good. Admit it!
One of yours, I presume?
Another partner?
As pranks go, high marks.
It was.
Ugh, don't encourage her.
I really don't care for your sense of humor.
Not funny.
Lighten up, you'll get wrinkles.
Allow me to introduce my partner, Vette. She has a habit of getting where she's not wanted. Like on your nerves, for instance.
Did you get the warhead, or were you too busy practicing your lines?
Yes, I got it, grumpy-pants.
Though I guess those lizard-brains will have figured out nothing's exploded by now. I'll see if I can't distract them.
Time to make ourselves scarce, we'll see you back at the hideout.
Toodles!
Keep nosin' around and I'll cut it off.
Those lizard-brains will be noticing that nothing's exploded. Why don't you go deal with that? Or just... y'know... go?
You want private time, I want to never know what happens in your private time. Win-win. Meet you back at the hideout.
